metadata.title: CVE-2021-30155 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.31.12 and 1.32.x through1.35.x before 1.35.2. ContentModelChange does not check if a user hascorrect permissions to create and set the content model of a nonexistentpage.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
